Description: During a BSEE Inspection, it was discovered that a Pressure Safety High Low installed on a well was observed pinned open and blocked rendering the device inoperable without a flag while this portion of the facility was operating unmonitored by personnel under normal conditions. 4/6/2011
Agency: Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement
Bureau of Safety and Environmental Enforcement

Description: During the course of the BOEMRE investigation into a fire with injury incident, it was discovered that the process piping was not properly isolated and the flammable contents rendered inert prior to utilizing a cutting torch to perform cutting operations.
